mapper.insert: insert into origin_table(data_source_info_id, tb_name, description, is_incremental, incre_col_name, incre_col_type) values (#{dataSourceInfoId}, #{tbName}, #{description}, #{isIncremental}, #{increColName}, #{increColType})
mapper.update: UPDATE origin_table SET data_source_info_id = #{dataSourceInfoId}, tb_name = #{tbName}, description = #{description}, is_incremental = #{isIncremental}, incre_col_name = #{increColName}, incre_col_type = #{increColType} WHERE origin_table_id = #{originTableId}
mapper.select: select origin_table_id as originTableId, data_source_info_id as dataSourceInfoId, tb_name as tbName, description as description, is_incremental as isIncremental, incre_col_name as increColName, incre_col_type as increColType from origin_table where origin_table_id = #{originTableId}
